conversion_verification.notes: A successful isometric cutaway conversion with clear wall geometry and depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and wall thickness capitalization; slight perspective flatness in some localized areas but overall very strong.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to the source plan; room proportions and adjacencies are mirrored accurately.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the 2D layout precisely, including kitchen stove and bathroom fixtures.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean presentation with good lighting; no text labels or UI artifacts present.

detected_errors.description: Some window openings on the outer walls are represented as glass panels without distinct frames.

summary: The 3D model is a highly faithful and geometrically accurate isometric representation of the original 2D floor plan.
